title: Replace header logo with uploaded neon green arrow design

requirements.summary: Replace the header logo image with the uploaded neon green arrow design showing 'LEARNING VIDEOS' text
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is replaced with the uploaded neon green arrow design
The logo displays correctly at the top left of the header
The image maintains proper dimensions and alignment within the header layout
The logo is visible on both mobile and desktop views

file_operations.description: Replace the existing header logo image element with the uploaded image file at frontend/public/assets/1771767120748.png. Update the img element at the specified XPath location (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the new neon green arrow design image as the src attribute. Ensure the image maintains proper dimensions and alignment within the existing header layout structure. The logo should display correctly on both mobile and desktop views without modifying other header elements or navigation structure.
